title: Extra Light Humanist Sans
content:
I’m looking for an extra light humanist sans,  
I like Bliss Extra Light very much, but would appreciate any suggestions.

 [‹ Type suggestions for project on Morocco](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014553/http:/typophile.com/node/17852 "Go to previous forum topic") [apple typography ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014553/http:/typophile.com/node/17897 "Go to next forum topic")
author: miles

comments.content:
De Groot has great light weights.
